name: An Easy Adventure
description:
This is my term 2 final project for the Game Development 1 class. 

This is a 2D platformer /  Adventure game.

I was inspired by the "I wanna" series. All the traps have almost the same feature. However, I am proud of this project, because this is the first time I figure out the logic by myself on coding. 

Hopefully, you will enjoy the game. 

Please leave comments if you want to. It will help me a lot. 

Thank you. 

Konnor Zhang :]

List of Features: 

  • 2D
  • Platformer
  • Traps
  • "Iwanna" traps
  • Short Game
  • Unfinished Project
